response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your every expectation. This product is not just a commodity; it's a testament to innovation, quality, and exclusivity. It is worth $1,000,000 to us, but we believe its true value lies in the hands of someone who can appreciate and utilize it to its fullest potential.

We are offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exceptional value considering its market worth and the benefits it offers. We understand that such a significant investment requires careful consideration, and we are confident that once you experience the product, you will see its true worth.

Please let us know if you would like to schedule a private viewing and demonstration of the product. We are here to answer any questions you might have and provide you with all the information needed to make an informed decision.

Thank you for your time and interest. We look forward to the possibility of working together.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
